DOC.brief_summary: This study ass safety , efficacy pharmacokinetics QAW039 steroid-free patient mild moderate persistent asthma .
DOC.criteria: Patients medical history mild moderate persistent allergic asthma . Patients must weigh least 45 kg participate study , must abody mass index ( BMI ) > 17 kg/m2 . Female patient must surgically sterilize , postmenopausal use doublebarrier method contraception Women childbearing potential . Smokers define history smoke previous 6 month smoke history 10 pack year , pack year define smoke equivalent 20 cigarette pack every day period 1 year Patients severe persistent asthma Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
